meanings.definition: A large flightless bird native to Africa, with a long neck and legs.
meanings.sent1: Ostriches are big birds that cannot fly.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of ostriches running in the savanna.
meanings.sent3: The ostriches in the zoo were showing off their long legs.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as long and elegant as an ostriches' neck.
meanings.sent5: The ostriches' legs were like stilts supporting their bodies.

meanings.definition: A person who refuses to face reality or difficult situations.
meanings.sent1: She's such an ostriches, always avoiding the truth.
meanings.sent2: Don't be an ostriches, deal with the problem head-on.
meanings.sent3: The ostriches in the office never want to discuss the tough issues.
meanings.sent4: Being an ostriches won't make the situation any better.
meanings.sent5: He's the biggest ostriches I know, burying his head in the sand.
